<script type='text/javascript'>
            function OnClientCommandExecuted(editor,commandName,tool)
            {
                if(commandName=='ToggleScreenMode' || commandName._commandName == 'ToggleScreenMode' )
                {
            
TogglePageControlsBar();
}
            }

            function TogglePageControlsBar( menuIDList )
            {
                if(typeof menuIDList != 'undefined' || menuIDList != null)
                {
                    var menuList = menuIDList.split(',');
                    for( var i=0; i<menuList.length; i++ )
                    {
                        var el = document.getElementByID(menuList[i]);

                        if( el != undefined )
                        {
                            if( el.style.visibility!='hidden' )
                                el.style.visibility ='hidden';
                            else 
                                el.style.visibility = 'visible';
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
</script>

//Search Watermark
$(window).load(function() {
	var watermark = 'Find what you need…';
	//init, set watermark text and class
	$('#ctl00_SearchTerm').val(watermark).addClass('watermark');
	//if blur and no value inside, set watermark text and class again.
	  $('#ctl00_SearchTerm').blur(function(){
	  if ($(this).val().length == 0){
		$(this).val(watermark).addClass('watermark');
		}
	});
	//if focus and text is watermrk, set it to empty and remove the watermark class
	$('#ctl00_SearchTerm').focus(function(){
	  if ($(this).val() == watermark){
		$(this).val('').removeClass('watermark');
		}
	});

});
</script><script>
$(document).ready(function() {
	$(window).on("resize", function () {
	
		var windowWidth = $('body').width();
		var wrapperWidth = $('.inner-bar').width();
		
		var coverWidth = (windowWidth - wrapperWidth) / 2;
		
		$('.menuCover').css({
			width : coverWidth + 'px',
			left : '-' + coverWidth + 'px'
		});
		
		var menuWidth = $('.megamenu').width();

var slideArea = (windowWidth - menuWidth);
var doubleMenu = (menuWidth * 2);


if($('#theme').hasClass('homepage')) {		
if(slideArea < doubleMenu) {
		$('.second-level-list > ul').css({
			width : '520px'	
		}).addClass('smallMenu');
}
else {
		$('.second-level-list > ul').css({
			width : (menuWidth * 2) + 'px'	
		}).removeClass('smallMenu');
}
}
		
		var worthWidth = (wrapperWidth - menuWidth);
		
		$('.worthDiscovering').css({
			width : worthWidth + 'px'
		});
		
		var worthImgHeight = $('.worthDiscovering img').height();
		var worthImgWidth = $('.worthDiscovering img').width();
		
		$('.worthDiscovering img').css({
			marginTop : '-' + (worthImgHeight / 2) + 'px',
			marginLeft : '-' + (worthImgWidth / 2) + 'px'
		});
	
	}).resize();
});
</script><script>

$(".second-level-list").each( function() {
    var lis = $(this).find("li.level2");

    var itemCount = $(lis).length
    var itemCount = (itemCount / 2);

    for(var i = 0; i < lis.length; i+=itemCount) {
      lis.slice(i, i+itemCount)
         .wrapAll('<li><ul></ul></li>');
    }
});


			$(".megamenu > div > ul > li").hover(function() {
			  $(this).siblings().find(".second-level-list:visible").stop().animate({'width': '0'}, 450);
			  var timeout = $(this).data("timeout");
			  if(timeout) clearTimeout(timeout);
			  //if (!$(".second-level-list").width() > 0) {
				$(this).find(".second-level-list").stop().animate({'width': '200%'}, 700);
			  //}
			}, function() {
				$(this).data("timeout", setTimeout($.proxy(function() {
					$(this).find(".second-level-list").stop().animate({'width': '0'}, 450);
				}, this), 500));
			});
			
			$(document).click(function() {
				$('.second-level-list:visible').stop().animate({'width': '0'}, 450);
			});
		}

$(".second-level-list").each( function() {

    var itemCount = $(lis).length
    var itemCount = ((itemCount / 3) + 1);

    for(var i = 0; i < lis.length; i+=itemCount) {
      lis.slice(i, i+itemCount)
         .wrapAll('<li><ul></ul></li>');
    }
});



			
			$(".megamenu > div > ul > li").hover(function() {
			  $(this).siblings().find(".second-level-list:visible").delay(800).slideUp(800);
			  var timeout = $(this).data("timeout");
			  if(timeout) clearTimeout(timeout);
			  if (!$(this).find(".second-level-list").is(':visible')) { 
				$(this).find(".second-level-list").delay(800).slideDown(800);
			  }
			}, function() {
				$(this).data("timeout", setTimeout($.proxy(function() {
					$(this).find(".second-level-list").slideUp(800);
				}, this), 500));
			});
			
			$(document).click(function() {
				$('.second-level-list:visible').hide();
			});
			
		}
		
	});

});

var acc = document.getElementsByClassName("accordion");
var i;
for (i = 0; i < acc.length; i++) {
    acc[i].onclick = function(){
        this.classList.toggle("active");
        var panel = this.nextElementSibling;
        if (panel.style.display === "block") 
		{
            panel.style.display = "none";
        } 
		else 
		{
            panel.style.display = "block";
        }
    }
}
  </script>
